name: YoutubeDL Material
short_description: Web UI for youtube-dl with subscription support and organization features.
description: Web UI for youtube-dl with subscription support and organization features. YoutubeDL Material is a self-hosted application focused on media, downloader, download, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host YoutubeDL Material on your home server to web ui for youtube-dl with subscription support and organization features without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use YoutubeDL Material to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
